description: (Update: Added support to download images when the phone is in 1x) Major new version! You can now use your own images! However, your images will be uploaded and stored on the server. Palm still does not allow us to access the phone's local image library and wont until the next major change to the API sometime in the fall. But there is a site you can use on your computer to upload and manage the images Switcharoo will use, at http://switcharoo.orbsix.com. --- Random wallpaper switcher. That's what this is. Runs automatically in the background and changes your wallpaper for you. Tons of amazing images in a bunch of different categories... or use your own images! *** Updates to this version: - Now you can upload your own images to the server. - Added a "My Favorites" feature, mark images as favorites and they will show up more often. - Added a "Dont Show Again" feature.  - Now downloads the next image right after it switches, no longer needing to download all the images at once. - Added a bunch of images to all the categories.
